MS MCQs

    Create a relationship between entities in Dataverse

    »

    1. Microsoft Dataverse supports all of the following relationships except which one?

      Many-to-many

      One-to-one

      One-to-many

      Many-to-one


    2. Which of the following statements about changing entities is true?

      You can change the entities in an existing many-to-many relationship.

      You cannot change the entities in a one-to-many relationship.

      You cannot change the entities in a many-to-many relationship.

      You cannot change the entities in a many-to-one relationship.


    3. Being able to relate two entities (relational design) is important for all of the following except which one?

      More efficient storage

      Better data accuracy

      Better Reporting

      Easier to design
